title: Vase with Cover
description:
Carved paper-thin white jade vase, loose rings; with cover.  Body decorated with floral forms and trailing branches.   Base and cover carved with collars of leaves; small inscription on neck.
5/16/2007 - One handle and finial of lid missing. Missing since before 1978 per B.Jacobsen. KKrenz
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Augustus L. Searle
